description: Heartwood, a community by StreetSide Developments - At the heart of it all lies good design. Featuring large open floorplans, ample cupboard space, and elegantly designed wood grain cabinet accents - families can live comfortably and host effortlessly. This C plan home offers 4 bedrooms, with a north facing private patio off the main floor kitchen and a south facing balcony off living & dining area. The lower level features a fourth bedroom with 10ft ceilings and a full bathroom. A side by side finished garage with an efficient heat-pump for heating and COOLING combining comfort, style and functionality - making it an ideal choice for those who want both relaxation and room to entertain. Our Sales Center is located at 3522 Harper Road, open Sat thru Wed 12-5pm. Fall Incentives on now!
